issue.title: [C++/Python] Expose file metadata of dataset pieces to caller
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This issue resolves partly the issue raised in ARROW-1983 by providing a way to collect FileMetaData objects of dataset pieces created via `write_to_dataset` function:
```


metadata_list = []
write_to_dataset(table, ..., metadata_collector=metadata_list)

```

where `metadata_list` will contain instances of file metadata objects of dataset pieces.
